categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Lucky" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. He accompanied Clone Commander Bly, Cameron, Flash, Clone Captain Rex, Anakin Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, and Aayla Secura to Maridun, where he was later killed by mastiff phalones along with Cameron and Flash.
